node.name: Chart
node.description: The Chart makes your data pop, and it is easy to use. It provides you with multiple charts like Bar, Column, Line, and more.
node.detailDesc: Chart makes your data pop. Its numerous charts like Line, Bar, Pie, and more are easy to use, and you can export your data to excel or even as images.

node.name: Editor
node.description: The Editor allows you to edit your Markdown documents using text or WYSIWYG and comes with Syntax Highlighting, Scroll-Sync, Live Preview, and Chart features.
node.detailDesc: Editor allows you to interact with their Markdown documents through both text and WYSIWYG. With Syntax Highlighting, Scroll-Sync, Live Preview, Charts, and much more diverse features and UI, it takes your word processing to the next level.

node.name: Grid
node.description: The Grid is a powerful library with features like data editing, filtering, sorting, and more, and can be used to customize the editor or the renderer to your desired format.
node.detailDesc: Grid is a powerful grid library with data editing, filtering, sorting, pagination features, and more. Furthermore, you can customize the editor and the renderer to your desired format and visualize your data however you like.

node.name: Calendar
node.description: The Calendar supports monthly, weekly, daily views and more, and you can create or edit your schedule with a simple dragging motion.
node.detailDesc: Calendar provides monthly, weekly, multi-weekly, daily views, and more, as well as a basic pop-up UI you can use to add/edit/delete your schedules. You can manage your schedule simply by dragging the schedules around. Managing your calendar has never been easier.

node.name: Image-editor
node.description: With the UI that is the perfect combination of simple and beautiful, the Image Editor is a Full-Featured one that is perfect for everyday use.
node.detailDesc: With the UI that is the perfect combination of simple and beautiful, Image Editor is a Full-Featured image editor that provides you with editing, drawing, and typing capabilities as well as a collection of great image filters that you can apply all at once.

node.name: App Loader
node.description: AppLoader is a library that you can use to load or install a certain app on the mobile device.

node.name: Auto Complete
node.description: AutoComplete component can suggest and even fill in the rest of the word and sentences given the inputted text.

node.name: Color Picker
node.description: ColorPicker is a simple and efficient color picker, true to its name.

node.name: Context Menu
node.description: ContextMenu displays the menu items that you can access via the right click.

node.name: Date Picker
node.description: DatePicker allows you to pick a date using a pop-up calendar.

node.name: Pagination
node.description: Pagination component can show you the current page within a multi-page document and also provides links for included pages.

node.name: Rolling
node.description: Rolling is a slider component that lets you view multiple contents in a selected area.

node.name: Select Box
node.description: SelectBox is a dropdown list component that you can use to select multiple menus easily.

node.name: Time Picker
node.description: TimePicker component allows you to use the SelectBox or the SpinBox to select the time.

node.name: Tree
node.description: Tree component displays the data structure of the hierarchy and allows you to view and edit the node names.

node.name: TOAST UI Doc
node.description: Documentation generator that creates the example page and the API document by parsing the JSDoc comments.

node.name: ESLint Config
node.description: ESLint configuration used with TOAST UI products to help find and fix problems in JavaScript code.

node.name: Release Note
node.description: Github release note generator to automatically summarize and classify the updates based on the commit logs.
